tool_description: Analyse text sentiment (positive, negative or neutro). Supports English and Portuguese.
name: Multilingual Text Sentiment Analysis
title: Multilingual Text Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: Analyse text sentiment
api_list.description:
This API returns a JSON containing:
- Sentiment type (positive, negative or neutro)
- Score

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Awesome great tutorial. Big thanks for taking this much effort to create such wonderful content.
